scripts.build: npm install && tsc && npm run copy-frontend
scripts.build-with-frontend: npm run build && echo 'Frontend files copied successfully'
scripts.copy-frontend: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const src='../frontend/dist';const dest='dist/frontend';if(fs.existsSync(src)){require('child_process').execSync('copyfiles -u 1 \"'+src+'/**/*\" '+dest+'/',{stdio:'inherit'});console.log('Frontend files copied successfully');}else{console.error('Frontend dist not found at:', path.resolve(src));process.exit(1);}"
